answers.answer: I'm afraid pineapple.etc rarely works.. I don't think theres much truth in many things but lots of walking can help..but baby will.only come when ready. How far along are you? Are you being induced because you're overdue?
Oh and please.never take castor oil.some may suggest it but its dangerous x
I was induced with pitocin with three children. Honestly, I would ask your doctors.
I'm 37 weeks but the baby is measuring 39 because I was so small they think if the baby gets much bigger I would have to have a c section and I'm already 2 cm dialated

Wow thats intresting last wk my baby measured 3-4wks ahead n im 5'1 shes expected to b high 8-9 pounds but my dr didnt say nothing about induction n shes posterior. Im 3cm n lost my plug. I would too also perfer natural induction vs pitocin. Try googling it, I kno sex, walking n spicy food. But thats jus what I read never tried it. Good luck girly :D
Thanks :) and it's because I was so small before becoming

Pregnant I only weighed 86 pounds an now it's like 112 but I'm still to small an they said thy would rathe be safe.... I tried eatin pinapple google said it worked about 50% the time if you are already dilated it just made my tounge burn!
I c, keep us posted hope u can get it goin naturally. All the ppl I kno jus took longer when they got induced, like 24hrs. The good thing is u'll b monitored so u kno baby will b safe :D

It took three days of inducing to get me into labour. I hope yours goes quicker than mine. I'm hoping to go naturally this time. Ps they can often be wrong about size of baby..they induced me ad I had gestational diabetes and they said the baby would be too big if I left it any longer. She was 6lb 6..so no where near big! Good luck. Hope you manage to go naturally in a few weeks .
Do your homework on induction. You can refuse it. It seems really early to be talking induction...even at your size. Good luck to you!!!

question: I'm secedualed to be induced Friday and would like to induce naturally so I don't have to deal with the drugs they use. Does anyone know about pinapple to induce labor or have tried it or anything else that works?
title: Trying to induce?
